column4: Hello fellow Ubuntu users, complete newbie here... I've just done a server install of Ubuntu - installed X, fluxbox, xterm, abiword, dillo, synaptic, gimp.... abiword and gimp work but Synaptic won't load and I can't get a terminal to load.... any ideas?
Its an old laptop... gnome was running real slow on the standard install
I am want a lightweight system and I installed gimp to try and figure out why synaptic wasn't loading
did you try sudo synaptic in a console?
